name: Airglow
detailed_description:
Airglow is a 3th person adventure lowpoly game in a big open world. You play as a wolf who gets seperated from the pack. Get unexpected help to find your way to your pack. Explore the nature, find the unforseen history of your pack and avoid to encounter the rival pack. Travel through different kinds of beautiful natures in different seasons.

Key Features:

• Explore a big open nature with trees, lakes, plants and caves

• Experience different seasons
• A one of a kind wolf story (not a wolf simulator)

short_description: You play as a wolf who gets seperated from the pack. Get unexpected help to find your way. Explore the nature and find the unforseen history of your pack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
